message: I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! It's a unique opportunity to own a truly exceptional item. I'm willing to sell it to you for $9500.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $8500. Can we meet in the middle?
I appreciate your interest in the product, Bob! However, I'm not quite ready to meet you at $8500. I'm willing to come down to $9000, but that's as low as I can go for now.
I appreciate your flexibility, but I'm still a bit above $9000. I'm willing to go up to $8200, but that's as high as I can go. Can we meet in the middle?
I'm glad we're getting closer to a deal, Bob! However, I'm still a bit above $8200. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I need to make a bit more than that. How about $9100?
I'm not sure we're getting closer to a deal, Alice. I'm willing to meet you at $9000, but that's as high as I'm willing to go. Can you consider that?
I'm not quite ready to meet you at $9000, Bob. I'm willing to compromise, but I need to get closer to my minimum price. How about $9200?
I'm starting to think we're getting a bit too far apart, Alice. I'm willing to meet you at $9000, but I'm not going any higher. Can you seriously consider that?
I understand we're getting close to the end of our negotiations, Bob. I'm willing to make one final concession. How about $9250?

I appreciate your concession, Alice, but I'm afraid I've reached my limit. I'm willing to meet you at $8000, but that's as low as I can go. If you're not willing to meet me there, I'll have to consider other options.
